collection_slug.description: Collection URL slug to group collection pages. Max 100 characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9 only. Optional.

page_slug.description: Page URL slug. Max 100 characters: only a-z, A-Z, 0-9, required.

definition.description: Name of JSON definition template. Max 60 characters including .json extention. Only a-z, A-Z, required.

template.description: Name of HTML template. Max 60 characters inlcluding .html extension. Only a-z, A-Z, required

title.description: Page title to display, max 60 characters, required.

meta_description.description: Summary description of Page for search engine results. Max 320 characters, optional.

image_path.description: Path or URL to media image, max 100 characters, only a-z, A-Z, and 0-9, optional.
